blogPost.excerpt:
Fifteen years after the creation of al-Shabaab in Somalia, terror still reigns and the reality on the ground just shifted more in their favor.

In a last ditch effort to leave a mark on foreign policy before his ouster, President Trump announced a drawdown of US troops in global hotspots around the world, including around 700 in Somalia. With no soldiers on the ground the plan promised to provide support through an already controversial and secretive drone program–which watchdog groups say has killed exponentially more civilians than the US admits.

VICE News travels to the frontline of Somalia’s war against al-Shabaab to see what the US pullout means for the next chapter in the war on terror.

Subscribe to VICE News here: http://bit.ly/Subscribe-to-VICE-News

Check out VICE News for more: http://vicenews.com

Follow VICE News here:

Instagram: http://instagram.com/vicenews

#VICENews #News
blogPost.body:
Fifteen years after the creation of al-Shabaab in Somalia, terror still reigns and the reality on the ground just shifted more in their favor.

In a last ditch effort to leave a mark on foreign policy before his ouster, President Trump announced a drawdown of US troops in global hotspots around the world, including around 700 in Somalia. With no soldiers on the ground the plan promised to provide support through an already controversial and secretive drone program–which watchdog groups say has killed exponentially more civilians than the US admits.

VICE News travels to the frontline of Somalia’s war against al-Shabaab to see what the US pullout means for the next chapter in the war on terror.

blogPost.author: VICE News

localize.title: 美国在索马里的反恐战争内幕
localize.description:
青年党在索马里成立15年后，恐怖活动依然猖獗，而当地的现实情况刚刚发生了对他们更有利的变化。

为了在下台前在外交政策上留下印记，特朗普总统在下台前最后一搏，宣布在全球热点地区缩减美军，其中包括索马里约700人。由于没有士兵在地面上，该计划承诺通过一个已经有争议的和秘密的无人机计划提供支持--监督组织说，杀死的平民比美国承认的成倍增加。

VICE新闻前往索马里打击青年党的前线，看看美国撤军对反恐战争的下一章意味着什么。

在这里订阅VICE新闻：http://bit.ly/Subscribe-to-VICE-News



更多内容请看VICE新闻：http://vicenews.com



在这里关注VICE新闻。

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vicenews

Twitter: https://twitter.com/vicenews

Tumblr: http://vicenews.tumblr.com/

Instagram: http://instagram.com/vicenews

更多视频来自VICE网：https://www.fb.com/vicevideo



#VICEN新闻#新闻

localize.title: 美國在索馬里的反恐戰爭內幕
localize.description:
青年黨在索馬里成立15年後，恐怖活動依然猖獗，而當地的現實情況剛剛發生了對他們更有利的變化。

爲了在下臺前在外交政策上留下印記，特朗普總統在下臺前最後一搏，宣佈在全球熱點地區縮減美軍，其中包括索馬里約700人。由於沒有士兵在地面上，該計劃承諾通過一個已經有爭議的和祕密的無人機計劃提供支持--監督組織說，殺死的平民比美國承認的成倍增加。

VICE新聞前往索馬里打擊青年黨的前線，看看美國撤軍對反恐戰爭的下一章意味着什麼。

在這裏訂閱VICE新聞：http://bit.ly/Subscribe-to-VICE-News



更多內容請看VICE新聞：http://vicenews.com



在這裏關注VICE新聞。

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vicenews

Tumblr: http://vicenews.tumblr.com/

Instagram: http://instagram.com/vicenews

previous.excerpt: So excited to officially partner with Chipotle and e.l.f. Cosmetics! It’s all that, and a bag of chips (and guac). Watch Trixie and Kim Chi try out the #elfxchipotle collection and their custom Eyes. Chips. Face. Bowls! Just like going through the line at Chipotle, the Chipotle Eyeshadow Palette is fresh and full of endless possibilities to customize. Turn up the spice with the Make It Hot lip gloss, or take it all to-go with the Eyes. Chips. Face. Makeup Bag. Shop it while it’s HOT these are gonna go fast! Plus order the Eyes. Chips. Face. Bowl (it’s vegan too!) in the “Featured” section of the Chipotle app or at chipotle.com. #Ad
previous.title: e.l.f. x Chipotle Collection + Mukbang with Kim Chi!

next.excerpt:
In the latest episode of GRAMMY.com's annual Meet The First-Time GRAMMY Nominee series, global pop superstars BTS share their excitement and "overflowing gratitude" for their fans for their Best Pop Duo/Group Performance nomination at the 2021 GRAMMY Awards show.

Tune into the 63rd GRAMMY Awards Sunday, March 14, on CBS to find out who will win.

https://www.grammy.com/grammys/news/bts-interview-2021-grammys-meet-the-first-time-grammy-nominee

About the Recording Academy / GRAMMYs: 
Recording Academy is the world's leading society of musical professionals, and is dedicated to celebrating, honoring, and sustaining music's past, present and future. 

Connect with the Recording Academy / GRAMMYs: 
WEBSITE: http://www.grammy.com
FACEBOOK: http://grm.my/2gcTcMk 
TWITTER: http://grm.my/2gDUHUD  
INSTAGRAM: http://grm.my/2gZGIvJ 

Subscribe NOW to the Recording Academy / GRAMMYs on YouTube: http://grm.my/1dTBF8H
#BTS #GRAMMYs #GRAMMYAwards
next.title: BTS | Meet The First-Time GRAMMY Nominees

localize.title: BTS｜首次入围格莱美奖提名名单
localize.description:
在GRAMMY.com年度 "Meet The First-Time GRAMMY Nominee "系列的最新一期节目中，全球流行巨星BTS分享了他们在2021年格莱美奖颁奖典礼上获得最佳流行组合/团体表演提名的激动心情和对粉丝 "溢于言表的感激"。

敬请收看3月14日（周日）CBS播出的第63届格莱美奖颁奖典礼，看看谁会获奖。

https://www.grammy.com/grammys/news/bts-interview-2021-grammys-meet-the-first-time-grammy-nominee

关于录音学院/格莱美奖。
录音学院是全球领先的音乐专业人士协会，致力于庆祝、表彰和支持音乐的过去、现在和未来。

与美国录音学院/格莱美奖联系。
網址：http://www.grammy.com
FACEBOOK: http://grm.my/2gcTcMk 
TWITTER: http://grm.my/2gDUHUD  
INSTAGRAM: http://grm.my/2gZGIvJ 

现在就在YouTube上订阅录音学院/格莱美奖：http://grm.my/1dTBF8H。
#BTS #格莱美奖 #格莱美奖 #格莱美奖

localize.title: BTS｜首次入圍格萊美獎提名名單
localize.description:
在GRAMMY.com年度 "Meet The First-Time GRAMMY Nominee "系列的最新一期節目中，全球流行巨星BTS分享了他們在2021年格萊美獎頒獎典禮上獲得最佳流行組合/團體表演提名的激動心情和對粉絲 "溢於言表的感激"。

敬請收看3月14日（週日）CBS播出的第63屆格萊美獎頒獎典禮，看看誰會獲獎。

https://www.grammy.com/grammys/news/bts-interview-2021-grammys-meet-the-first-time-grammy-nominee

關於錄音學院/格萊美獎。
錄音學院是全球領先的音樂專業人士協會，致力於慶祝、表彰和支持音樂的過去、現在和未來。

與美國錄音學院/格萊美獎聯繫。
網址：http://www.grammy.com
FACEBOOK: http://grm.my/2gcTcMk 
TWITTER: http://grm.my/2gDUHUD  
INSTAGRAM: http://grm.my/2gZGIvJ 

現在就在YouTube上訂閱錄音學院/格萊美獎：http://grm.my/1dTBF8H。
